abstract: In contrast to the party atmosphere at Apple stores, a Bay Area AT&T store was funereal last night.
snippet: In contrast to the party atmosphere at Apple stores, a Bay Area AT&T store was funereal last night.
lead_paragraph: After spending six hours in line, then another 90 minutes inside the Apple Store in Corte Madera, north of San Francisco, I decided to check out the action at the AT&T Wireless store in nearby San Rafael.

headline.main: Sad Scenes at an AT&T Wireless Store
